name: The Sellswords
description:
This game was made for Kenney Jam 2021. It uses free assets available from Kenney that have been altered by me.

I didn't have time to add a title, instruction OR end screen! Sorry about that - no sound either, don't worry your speakers aren't broken!

You can play this game solo or local co-op and the idea of the game is:

  • AI characters come and ask for a sword of a certain colour
  • Controlling the guy (I,J,K,L) at the top, you move over the correct sword and pick it up (O)
  • You then place it (O) in one of the rotating chests.
  • Then controlling the guy (W,A,S,D) at the bottom, you go and collect the sword (E) and give it to the AI character (E)
  • If you the AI character the incorrect sword, they retaliate and fire cannons on your position.
  • Get it wrong 3 times are you're outttttta there!

Controls in bold ^

Hope you enjoy :)
